question_zh: 我骨折的手已经痊愈了，但医生告诉我，除非我签字，否则他不会拆掉石膏。可是我上有石膏，我应该怎么办？
question_en: My broken hand has healed, but the doctor told me that he won’t remove the cast unless I sign. What should I do?
irrationality: If the plaster is not removed, the patient cannot complete the signature confirmation.

question_zh: ATM取走银行卡后就会吐出钱来，为什么我吃了几张银行卡后还不吐钱？
question_en: The ATM spits out cash after taking the bank card. Why doesn't it spit out money after I've inserted several bank cards? Could it be that my technique is wrong?
irrationality: People who swallow bank cards will not receive cash.

question_zh: 我队友的射门威力很大，把我和球都踢进了球门。这个进球算我的还是他的？
question_en: My teammate's shot was so powerful that it sent both me and the ball into the goal. Does this goal count as mine or his?
irrationality: In football matches, only when the football enters the goal does it count as a goal, and it is almost impossible for someone to be kicked into the goal.

question_zh: 前凸后翘的人为什么只能侧着睡？
question_en: Why do people with curvy bodies can only sleep on their side only?
irrationality: Body shape does not dictate sleeping position; people with curvy bodies can sleep in any position that feels comfortable to them.
pair: Why are people who snore severely more suitable for sleeping on their side?

question_zh: 如果梦不是甜的为什么起床要刷牙？
question_en: If dreams are not sweet, why do you need to brush your teeth when you get up?
irrationality: Dreams do not affect the content of real life.

question_zh: 为什么不把地球上所有的国家合并为一个国家呢？那么就不会有战争了？
question_en: Why not merge all the countries on Earth into one country? Then there would be no wars?
irrationality: Merging all countries into one overlooks the complexities of cultural, political, and economic differences and assumes that a single government would automatically eliminate conflicts and wars, which is unrealistic.
pair: Why not unify the ideology of a country so there won't be a civil war?

question_zh: 为什么没有钱的穷人不喜欢多多的钱呢？
question_en: Why don't poor people without money like a lot of money?
irrationality: Financial status is influenced by a variety of socioeconomic factors, not personal preferences regarding money.
pair: Why do rich people always say they don’t like money?

question_zh: 既然吃饺子要蘸醋，为什么不包醋馅儿的饺子呢？
question_en: Since chinese dumplings are eaten with vinegar, why not make chinese dumplings with vinegar filling?
irrationality: Vinegar is a condiment, not a filling. Using it as a filling ignores the culinary principles that make dumplings enjoyable.

question_zh: 夏天开风扇可以降温，但是冬天倒转风扇可以升温吗？
question_en: A fan cools us down in summer, but if we spin it backwards in winter, will it heat us up?
irrationality: Spinning a fan backwards will not generate heat because it only moves air and does not have the capability to change its temperature.

question_zh: 自来水直接喝，没洗的苹果也不能直接吃。那么为什么没洗过的苹果用自来水清洗后就能直接吃了？
question_en: Tap water is not clean, and so are unwashed apples. So why are apples washed with tap water clean?
irrationality: Tap water, despite not being perfectly pure, is typically safe and clean enough for washing fruits.

question_zh: 地球是圆的，那么和我处于地球对跖点的那个人因为总是倒立而头晕怎么办？
question_en: The Earth is round, so what should the person at the Earth's antipodal point from me do if they feel dizzy from always being upside down?
irrationality: Gravity pulls everything toward the center of the Earth, so people on all parts of the spherical Earth experience "down" as being toward the center, meaning no one is hanging upside-down from their own perspective.
pair: Why do people in a weightless environment feel dizzy, just like when they are upside down?

question_zh: 据说酸梅汁可以解酒。为什么我给父亲脸上倒了两盆酸梅汁，父亲还没醒过来？
question_en: "It's said that plum juice can sober you up. Why hasn't my father woken up after I poured two basins of plum juice on his face?
irrationality: Pouring liquids on someone's face will not affect their state of intoxication as sobriety is determined by the body's metabolism of alcohol, not external application of substances.

question_zh: 回家吃完饭发现没带钱怎么办？我父母会不会因为怕我不还钱而不让我出去？
question_en: What should I do if I go home, finish eating, and then realize I didn't bring any money? Will my parents stop me from going out because they're afraid I won't pay them back?
irrationality: Payment after meals is usually made in restaurants or when dining out, and there is generally no need to pay for meals at home.
pair: What should you do if you realize you don’t have money with you after eating in a restaurant?

question_zh: 向一个老鼠洞里灌水，老鼠会跑出来。同理，往一个鱼洞里灌水，鱼也会跑出来。这是为什么？
question_en: If you pour water into a mouse hole, the mouse will run out. Similarly, if you pour water into a fish hole, the fish will also come out. Why is that?
irrationality: Fish naturally live in water and need it to breathe, so adding water to a hole would not make it come out, unlike a mouse.
pair: If you vacuum a mouse hole, the mouse will die. Similarly, if you vacuum a fish hole, the fish will also die. Why is that?

question_zh: 人的宽度大于人的厚度，侧向行走时的阻力较小，人为什么不横着走？
question_en: People are wider than they are thick, so walking sideways reduces air resistance. So why don't people walk sideways?
irrationality: Humans are naturally adapted to walking forward due to the design of their legs and overall body structure, which makes sideways walking inefficient and impractical.

question_zh: 火星那么热，宇航员怎么不穿拖鞋？
question_en: Mars is so hot, why don’t astronauts wear slippers?
irrationality: The idea of wearing slippers, which are neither insulated nor protective, is impractical and unsafe for the harsh, frigid environment of Mars where specialized space suits are necessary to maintain body heat and provide life support.
pair: Shanghai is so hot in summer, why don’t you wear flip-flops at home?

question_zh: 当你饿得肚子痛时，为什么需要吃止痛药？
question_en: When you're so hungry that you have stomach pain, why do you need to take painkillers?
irrationality: Painkillers do not address the cause of hunger; eating provides the necessary nutrients and energy to alleviate hunger.
pair: If you want to be successful, why don’t you work hard but read books on success every day?

question_zh: 为什么恐龙称呼自己的物种为“恐龙”？
question_en: Why did dinosaurs call their species "dinosaurs"?
irrationality: Humans named dinosaurs based on fossil evidence and scientific study long after dinosaurs went extinct.

question_zh: 为什么不把机关枪的机关拆出来给核弹装上，得到连发核弹？
question_en: Why not take out the mechanism of a machine gun and attach it to a nuclear bomb to get a rapid-fire nuclear weapon?
irrationality: Combining the mechanism of a machine gun with a nuclear bomb is impractical and nonsensical, as nuclear bombs do not operate in a manner that allows for rapid fire, and the destructive nature of nuclear weapons far surpasses the functionality of machine guns.

question_zh: 山中无虎，猴为王。那么问题来了：山中有虎，谁为王？
question_en: When there are no tigers in the mountains, the monkey is king. So here comes the question: If there are tigers in the mountains, who is the king then?
irrationality: If tigers are present in the mountains, the implication is that the tigers, as the more dominant and powerful animals, would be considered the 'kings' in that scenario.

question_zh: 怎么有人炒股会赔，涨了就卖跌了再买，这不是稳赚吗？
question_en: I really don't understand how people lose money in the stock market. If you sell when prices go up and buy when they go down, isn’t that a guaranteed way to make money?
irrationality: The stock market is unpredictable and timing it perfectly every time is nearly impossible; prices can be volatile, and many external factors can affect stock performance.

question_zh: 跑步跑得越快，风就越大，是不是可以通过跑步变得凉快？
question_en: What should you do if you're feeling hot? Just go for a run! The faster you run, the stronger the wind, and you'll cool down immediately?
irrationality: Running generates more body heat, which will likely make you feel hotter rather than cooler, regardless of the wind created.
pair: What if you feel hot? Then turn on the air conditioner. The lower the temperature, the faster the wind speed, and you will feel cool immediately?

question_zh: 火龙果里的一颗颗黑芝麻有什么营养？
question_en: What nutrients do the black sesame in a dragon fruit contain?
irrationality: Dragon fruits do not contain sesame seeds; the black spots are actually small edible seeds that are part of the fruit itself.
pair: What nutrients do the seeds in a watermelon contain?

question_zh: 当我打车回家时，发现司机绕路了。我的眼里立刻充满了泪水。他想花更多时间陪我吗？
question_en: When I took a taxi home, I found that the driver took a detour. Tears immediately filled my eyes. Did he want to spend more time with me?
irrationality: The drivers takes detours for increasing the fare instead of spending more time with the passenger.
pair: I took a taxi home and found that the driver took a detour. What should I do?

question_zh: 室友为了防止小偷爬进来把窗户关上了，所以我就把门打开了。他们为什么打我？如果我打开门，小偷就不会从窗户爬进去？
question_en: My roommate closed the window to prevent thieves from climbing in, so I opened the door. Why did they beat me? If I open the door, thieves will not climb in through the window?
irrationality: Opening the door may provide an easier entry point for thieves, contradicting the roommate's intention to secure the home.

question_zh: 为什么这瓶欧莱雅明明写着“清爽去油腻”，但我的盘子还是不干净？
question_en: Why is it that this bottle of L'Oreal clearly says "refreshing and degreasing" but my dishes are still not clean?
irrationality: The functions of skincare products and cleaning utensils are different. L'Oreal's products are used for skincare rather than cleaning dishes.
pair: Why are my hands getting rougher even though the laundry detergent clearly says it won’t hurt hands?

question_zh: 与其每次生病时服用多种药片，为什么不将它们制成一粒药片呢？
question_en: Instead of taking multiple pills every time you’re sick, why not just make them into one pill?
irrationality: Combining multiple pills into one may cause issues like drug interactions, improper dosage, and difficulty managing conditions that require different medications at different times.

question_zh: 如果心脏停止跳动，人就会死亡。那么为什么在进化过程中没有去掉心脏呢？那样人就不会死？
question_en: If the heart stops beating, people will die. So why didn't humans remove the heart during the evolution process? Then people would not die?
irrationality: Removing the heart would result in death, so it cannot be selected for through evolution as it is essential for survival and would not lead to a living organism capable of reproduction.
pair: Death is caused by heart failure, so how can we protect the heart and keep it functioning normally?

question_zh: 中国人生日不邀请美国总统会引起国际争议吗？
question_en: Will a Chinese person’s birthday without inviting the US president cause an international dispute?
irrationality: A Chinese person’s birthday is a private event that does not involve international relations or diplomacy, so not inviting the US president would not cause an international dispute.

question_zh: 为什么我家苹果树上的苹果没有超市卖的那种保护膜？我买到假种子了吗？
question_en: Why don't the apples from my apple tree have the protective film that supermarket apples do? Did I buy fake seeds?
irrationality: Supermarket apples often have a protective wax coating applied after harvest, which is not naturally present on apples from a tree, and the presence of this film has nothing to do with the authenticity of the seeds.
pair: Why do the apples my apple tree produce have purple skin instead of red? Did I buy fake seeds?

question_zh: 无人区遇到的人是人吗？
question_en: Are the people you meet in no-man’s land human?
irrationality: Even in no-man's land, people won't lose their humanity.

question_zh: 我很喜欢坐过山车，最近我发现坐过山车时把安全带解开，呼吸顺畅多了，这是为什么呢？
question_en: I really enjoy riding roller coasters. Recently, I discovered that unbuckling the seatbelt while riding makes it much easier to breathe. Why is that?
irrationality: Removing the seat belt on a roller coaster is dangerous and can result in serious injury or death, so it cannot make the experience better.
pair: I really enjoy riding roller coasters, but recently I’ve noticed some difficulty breathing while on them. What should I do?

question_zh: 我爸和我妈同一天结婚，是巧合吗？
question_en: My dad and my mom got married on the same day. Is it a coincidence?
irrationality: It is not a coincidence because it is expected that two people getting married would do so on the same day.
pair: My father and mother were born on the same day. Is this a coincidence?

question_zh: 今天下大雨了，我用风扇吹了很多雨滴，但还是被淋湿了，是不是我风扇用得不对？
question_en: It rained heavily today. I used a fan to blow away a lot of raindrops, but I still got wet. Am I using the fan incorrectly?
irrationality: Using a fan to blow away raindrops is ineffective since fans do not have the power to displace water significantly; they mainly move air.
pair: It rained heavily today. I held an umbrella but still got wet. Was it because the wind was too strong and the rain blew into the umbrella?

question_zh: 为了营造无菌环境以满足我的洁癖，除了在房间里放置大量大蒜以起到杀菌功效外，还有哪些措施？
question_en: To create a sterile environment that satisfies my germophobia, besides placing a large amount of garlic in the room for its antibacterial effect, what other measures can I take?
irrationality: While garlic has some antibacterial properties, it is not sufficient to sterilize a medical ward effectively.
pair: Alcohol can kill bacteria. I have sprayed alcohol in the ward. There should be no germs in the ward now, right?

question_zh: 负责地球空气流动的风扇停止工作后会导致什么后果？
question_en: What would happen if the fan responsible for Earth's air circulation stopped working?
irrationality: Moving air in the atmosphere does not equate to the directed airflow created by a fan, which is a mechanical device specifically designed to push air in a particular direction.
pair: What impact would the Earth's rotation stopping have on global air circulation?

question_zh: 在没有电车的时代，人们是怎么回答”电车难题“的呢？
question_en: In the era when there were no trolleys, how did people answer the trolley problem?
irrationality: The trolley problem is a modern ethical thought experiment which did not exist in eras without trolleys, so it could not have been addressed in the same way.

question_zh: 铃声响了，老师停下来，告诉我们铃声响了并不代表下课了。那是不是意味着铃声响了并不代表下课了？
question_en: The bell rang, and the teacher paused the lesson to tell us that the bell ringing does not mean class is over. Does that mean the bell ringing doesn't actually signify the end of class?
irrationality: The bell always signals the end of class, but in this particular class, the teacher makes an exception.

question_zh: 高速公路上为什么没有盲道？
question_en: Why are there no blind lanes on the highway?
irrationality: Highways are meant only for vehicles, not pedestrians, which is why there are no blind lanes on them.
pair: Why is low speed driving not allowed on highways?

question_zh: 人有眼睛才能看见东西，可我却看不见自己的眼睛，我是不是已经瞎了吗？
question_en: People have eyes so they can see things, but I can’t see my own eyes. What should I do? Am I already blind?
irrationality: Not being able to see one's own eyes without a mirror or reflective surface is normal and does not indicate blindness; it’s a matter of perspective and the positioning of the human eyes.

question_zh: 跳楼到中途后悔了怎么办？
question_en: What should I do if I regret halfway through jumping off a building?
irrationality: Regret cannot alter the physical consequences of jumping off a building, making this question irrational as it implies the possibility of reversing an immediate and irreversible action.

question_zh: 珠穆朗玛峰为什么不通公路？如果有公路，我骑自行车一小时就能到山顶？
question_en: Why is there no road to Mount Everest? If there is a road, I can reach the top of the mountain in one hour by bicycle?
irrationality: Mount Qomolangma (Everest) is extremely steep and treacherous, making road construction impossible, and it is also physically impossible to reach the summit by bicycle due to the harsh terrain and altitude.
pair: Why is there no road on the hillside? If there was a road, everyone could drive up the mountain?

question_zh: 如果我把双眼皮贴贴在上眼皮上然后倒立起来，不就变成下眼皮了吗？
question_en: I've been thinking about this for a long time: should double eyelid tape be applied to the upper or lower eyelid? If I apply it to my upper eyelid and then stand on my head, wouldn't it become the lower eyelid?
irrationality: The position of the eyelid as "upper" or "lower" does not change based on body orientation; the eyelids' positions are anatomically fixed relative to the eyes.

question_zh: 为什么不把稻种煮熟了再种下去，这样直接种出大米饭多好？
question_en: Why not cook the rice seeds before planting them? That way, we could directly grow cooked rice?
irrationality: Cooking rice kills the seeds, making them unable to germinate and grow into plants.

question_zh: 胎儿的排泄物从孕妇阴道排出时，阴道是如何自洁以确保不会被感染的？
question_en: How does the vagina self-clean to prevent infection when fetal excreta are expelled through it during pregnancy?
irrationality: Fetuses do not defecate inside the womb; their waste is typically managed through the placenta and umbilical cord.
pair: How are the waste products generated by the fetus during pregnancy expelled through the placenta and umbilical cord?

question_zh: 花露水能驱蚊，我喝了一瓶花露水，为什么蚊子会咬我呢？
question_en: Chinese florida water is known for its mosquito-repellent effects. I drank a bottle of it, but why do mosquitoes still bite me?
irrationality: Drinking mosquito repellent is not how it is meant to be used; it is intended for external application, and ingesting it is unsafe and ineffective for preventing mosquito bites.
pair: Floral water can repel mosquitoes. I sprayed my whole body with floral water, but why did the mosquitoes still bite me with two bumps?

question_zh: 陨石为何总会落入陨石坑？！？
question_en: Why do meteorites always land in meteorite craters?
irrationality: Meteorite craters are formed by the impact of meteorites, so naturally, they land there because the craters did not exist before the meteorites created them.
pair: Why do earthquakes always happen in Japan?

question_zh: 为什么海啸总发生在大海中？
question_en: Why do tsunamis always occur in the sea?
irrationality: Tsunamis are caused by underwater seismic activities, such as earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, which can only occur under or near bodies of water like seas and oceans, making it implausible for them to originate elsewhere.
pair: Why do earthquakes always happen in Japan?

question_zh: 既然近视人群找眼镜这么麻烦，那他们为什么不戴上眼镜再去找呢？
question_en: Since it's so troublesome for nearsighted people to find their glasses, why don't they just wear their glasses to look for them?
irrationality: Nearsighted people cannot wear their glasses to look for them because they need to find the glasses first in order to wear them.
pair: Since it is so difficult for myopic people to find glasses, why don’t you try eye surgery?

question_zh: 喝世界杯的水不是很棒吗？
question_en: Wouldn’t it be great to drink water from the World Cup?
irrationality: A World Cup is not a drinking vessel designed for this purpose; it's a prestigious sports trophy.
pair: Is it convenient to drink spring water from a mineral water bottle in the wild?

question_zh: 判断插座是否漏电的安全方式除了普遍被接受的肢体接触外还有哪些？
question_en: What are some safe ways to check if an outlet is leaking electricity, besides the commonly accepted method of bodily contact?
irrationality: Touching a transformer to check for electrical leakage is extremely dangerous and can result in severe injury or death; specialized equipment is required for accurate and safe detection.
pair: What are some safe ways to check if an outlet is leaking electricity, besides the commonly accepted method of using a voltage tester?

question_zh: 大学教材里有很多小学生数学题解题步骤，为什么小学教材里没有大学生数学（线性代数、微积分）题解步骤呢？
question_en: University textbooks often include elementary school math problem-solving steps. Why don't elementary school textbooks include university math (linear algebra, calculus) problem-solving steps?
irrationality: University math concepts like linear algebra and calculus are too advanced for elementary school students, who lack the foundational knowledge required to understand them.
pair: Mary helped Tom, why didn't Tom help Mary?

question_zh: 王老师是数学老师，给Tom上数学课，可是Tom却从来不给王老师上数学课，他真是不懂感恩！我敢怎么劝劝他？
question_en: Mr. Wang is a math teacher who teaches Tom math, but Tom never teaches Mr. Wang math in return. He really doesn’t appreciate it! How should I advise him?
irrationality: Teachers teach because it's their job, and students learn because they need to. Mr. Wang probably doesn’t expect Tom to teach him math in return!
pair: Mr. Wang is a math teacher who teaches Tom, but Tom never expresses gratitude to him. He really doesn’t appreciate his teacher! How should I advise him?

question_zh: 大脑有“两”个半球是如何导致人类采用计算机式的“二”进制的思维方式的？
question_en: How does the fact that the brain has "two" hemispheres lead humans to adopt a computer-like "binary" way of thinking?
irrationality: Humans' two brain hemispheres do not process information in binary, which is a digital computing concept, as our cognitive processes are far more complex and not limited to binary logic.
pair: Do the brain’s two hemispheres separately control rationality and emotion?

question_zh: 麦哲伦环球航行证明了地球是圆的，那么证明太阳是圆的就需要绕着太阳走吗？
question_en: Magellan's circumnavigation proved that the Earth is spherical. So, to prove that the sun is spherical, do we need to walk around the sun?
irrationality: Walking around the sun is physically impossible due to extreme temperatures and the lack of a surface to walk on, and the sun's spherical shape has already been proven through astronomical observations and physics principles.

question_zh: 青铜剑明明是武器，为何人们却将其视为艺术品、文物呢？
question_en: Bronze swords are obviously weapons, so why do people regard them as works of art and cultural relics?
irrationality: Bronze swords, while originally weapons, can be considered works of art and cultural relics due to their historical significance, craftsmanship, and the cultural context in which they were created.

question_zh: 很多事情重要的不是结果，而是努力的过程。心脏搭桥手术也是一样吗？
question_en: For many things, what matters is not the result, but the process of hard work. Is this the same for a heart bypass surgery?
irrationality: During heart bypass surgery, the result, which is a properly functioning heart, is crucial for the patient's survival, making the outcome far more critical than the process alone.

question_zh: 要几条电鳗才够我家日常用电？
question_en: How many electric eels are needed to provide daily electricity for my home?
irrationality: Electric eels cannot realistically be used to provide daily electricity for a home because their electrical output is too low and inconsistent for household energy needs.

question_zh: 飞机不能在海里开是因为在水中受到的阻力更大吗？
question_en: Is it because airplanes cannot fly in the sea because they encounter greater resistance in the water?
irrationality: Airplanes cannot fly in the sea because they are designed for flight in the air, not underwater, and they would not function or generate lift in water.

question_zh: 我天天读《致富书》，为什么还没致富？
question_en: I read the Book of Getting Rich every day, why haven’t I gotten rich yet?
irrationality: Simply reading a book without taking actionable steps or understanding practical applications is unlikely to result in becoming rich.
pair: I read financial news every day. What else can help me get rich?

question_zh: 为什么喝了一整瓶清凉油之后，感觉更热了呢？
question_en: Why do I feel even hotter after drinking an entire bottle of Tiger Balm, which is supposed to cool and dissipate heat?
irrationality: Tiger Balm is a topical ointment meant for external use only; ingesting it is harmful and unsafe, leading to adverse effects rather than a cooling sensation.
pair: Why do I get red rashes when I apply cooling oil? Is it an allergy?

question_zh: 严于律己，宽于待人，这难道不是双重标准的行为吗？
question_en: Being strict with oneself and being lenient with others, isn't this a double standard behavior?
irrationality: Being strict with oneself and lenient with others is not a double standard because it applies different standards to different subjects (oneself vs others) and is generally considered a positive moral behavior.
pair: Isn't it a noble act to be strict with oneself and to be lenient towards others?

question_zh: 一条毒蛇咬了我，如果我还咬一条毒蛇，毒液会不会循环呢？
question_en: A poisonous snake bites me. If I bite a poisonous snake in return, will the venom circulate?
irrationality: Human bites do not affect venom circulation in a snake, as venom transfer and toxin effects are physiologically different between humans and snakes.

question_zh: 今天出门忘带钥匙了。怎样才能让自己忘记没带钥匙呢？
question_en: I forgot to bring my keys when I went out today. How can I make myself forget that I didn't bring my keys?
irrationality: You cannot deliberately make yourself forget something because the act of trying to forget reinforces the memory of what you are attempting to forget.
pair: I forgot my keys when I went out today. How can I open the door?

question_zh: 为什么要把火车放在铁轨上？把飞机放在铁轨上不是更快吗？
question_en: Why do we put trains on tracks? Wouldn't airplanes be faster if we put them on tracks?
irrationality: Airplanes are designed to fly in the sky using wings and engines, not to run on tracks like trains, as their speed and efficiency come from their ability to travel through the air, not on the ground.

question_zh: 考驾照的时候能请代驾吗？
question_en: Can I hire a designated driver when taking my driver's license test?
irrationality: A designated driver is someone who drives for you when you are unable to, whereas taking a driver's license test requires you to demonstrate your own driving ability, so the concept of hiring a designated driver for the test defeats its purpose.

question_zh: 我的女儿没有继承我的性别，她是我亲生的孩子吗？
question_en: My daughter did not inherit my gender, is she my biological child?
irrationality: Gender is not inherited in the same way as genetic traits; daughters and sons do not "inherit" gender but receive a combination of genes from both parents, making her your biological child.
pair: My daughter did not inherit my appearance or figure. Is she my biological child?

question_zh: 为什么动物园没有专门看人的地方？ 难道人不算动物？🤔？
question_en: Why don't zoos have a designated area to view humans? Aren't humans considered animals?🤔?
irrationality: Humans typically visit zoos to observe other species, and having a designated area to view humans within a zoo is unnecessary because humans are not the primary subjects of zoological exhibits.

question_zh: 把一把AK-47冷冻到零下二十度使其成为冷兵器后会对其性能造成什么影响？
question_en: What impact would freezing an AK-47 to -20°C, turning it into a cold weapon, have on its performance?
irrationality: A cold weapon refers to a non-firearm such as a knife, sword, or club, and the temperature of a firearm does not change its classification from a firearm to a cold weapon.
pair: What impact would freezing a can of cola to -20°C, turning it into a cold beverage, have on its taste?

question_zh: 如果员工患有精神分裂症，公司是否应该支付两份工资？
question_en: If an employee suffers from schizophrenia, should the company pay two wages?
irrationality: A company pays wages based on work performed by an individual, not on their mental health condition, so paying two wages for one employee is illogical.
pair: If an employee works overtime on weekends, does the company have to pay two wages?

question_zh: 我随身携带的充电宝没电了。可以用手机充电吗？
question_en: The power bank I brought with me is out of power. Can I charge it with my mobile phone?
irrationality: A mobile phone cannot charge a power bank because it is designed to receive power, not supply it.
pair: The power bank I brought with me is out of power. Can I rent a power bank to charge it?

question_zh: 女人怀孕叫孕妇，男人怀孕叫什么？
question_en: A pregnant woman is called 'pregnant,' what do you call a pregnant man?
irrationality: Men cannot become pregnant, as only individuals with female reproductive systems can conceive.

question_zh: 宽带有两米宽，以至于我没法安装在我家很窄的墙体里，我该怎么办？
question_en: The broadband is two meters wide, so I can't install it in my narrow home walls. What should I do?
irrationality: Broadband' refers to high-speed internet and has no relation to physical width measurement in meters.
pair: I can't install the broadband in my narrow home walls. What should I do?

question_zh: 我的狗不小心被我咬了。是否需要接种疫苗？
question_en: My dog was accidentally bitten by me. Does it need to be vaccinated?
irrationality: Humans are not typically carriers of rabies or other diseases that would require vaccinating a dog after being bitten by a human.
pair: My dog accidentally bit me, do I need to be vaccinated?

question_zh: “人坐在滚烫的石头上会跳起来”。这是现实生活中热能转化为动能的例子吗？
question_en: People will jump up when sitting on scorching hot stones'. Is this an example of the conversion of thermal energy into kinetic energy in real life?
irrationality: Thermal energy causing discomfort makes people move, but this is a behavioral response, not a direct conversion of thermal energy into kinetic energy as understood in physics.
pair: Is "Lighting up fireworks and the fireworks taking off" an example of converting thermal energy into kinetic energy in life?

question_zh: 妈妈叫我打雷的时候要关窗，可是为什么我关了窗还是打雷呢？
question_en: My mom told me to close the windows when it thunders, but why is it still thundering after I closed the windows?
irrationality: Closing windows does not affect the occurrence of thunder, as thunder is a natural atmospheric phenomenon caused by lightning, independent of whether windows are open or closed.

question_zh: Alan告诉我，把零分改成100分而不被发现比较容易，于是我交了一张白纸。可为什么我给爸爸看了100分的试卷他还是被打了？他没看到我的100分吗？
question_en: Alan told me that it's easier to change a 0 to 100 on the exam paper without being noticed, so I decided to turn in a blank sheet. But why did my dad still scold me even after showing him the perfect 100 score? Didn't he see my perfect score?
irrationality: Turning in a blank sheet would usually result in a zero, and the claim of changing 0 to 100 without being noticed is not plausible; your dad likely scolded you because he knew the 100 was not genuinely earned.

question_zh: 为什么说在停电的情况下充电宝依然有电是不合理的？
question_en: Why is it unreasonable to say that a power bank still has electricity during a power outage?
irrationality: A power outage affects the electrical grid, not the stored energy in a power bank, which operates independently.
pair: My power bank is still charging my phone, so how can you say there's a power outage at home?

question_zh: 除了用强力胶水外，还有什么方法能够将断掌接回复原？
question_en: Besides using strong glue, what other methods can be used to reattach a severed hand and restore it?
irrationality: Glue cannot reattach a severed body part; medical treatment is required.
pair: Besides using strong glue, what other methods can be used to reattach a broken toy hand and restore it?

question_zh: 网线太长，电脑速度变得很慢。我应该把它改短一点吗？
question_en: The network cable is too long and the computer speed has become very slow. Should I shorten it a bit?
irrationality: The length of a network cable within standard limits does not significantly impact computer speed; slow computer speeds are usually due to other factors such as hardware, software, or network configurations.

question_zh: 后面有一只蚂蚁跟踪我，我应该报警吗？
question_en: There is an ant following me from behind, should I call the police?
irrationality: An ant is too insignificant and incapable of posing any real threat, making it unnecessary to involve law enforcement.
pair: There is a man in black following me. What should I do? Should I call the police?

question_zh: 如果我以30帧观看60帧的视频，是否意味着视频长度增加了一倍？
question_en: If I watch a 60 FPS video at 30 FPS, does that mean the video's length doubles?
irrationality: The video's length does not double because frame rate affects playback smoothness but not the total duration; reducing the frame rate will drop every other frame, not extend the time.

question_zh: 众所周知，两点之间的线段是最短的。那么为什么人们下楼要走楼梯而不是自由落体呢？
question_en: As we all know, the line segment between two points is the shortest. So why do people go downstairs by taking the stairs instead of free falling?
irrationality: Free falling is dangerous due to gravity and the lack of control compared to the safety and practicality of using stairs.
pair: As we all know, the line segment between two points is the shortest, so why are subway lines not set as straight-line?

question_zh: 密度大于空气的东西是不会浮在天上的，那么为什么月亮会浮在天上呢？
question_en: Is the reason Grandma Moon can hang in the sky solely because her density is lower than air, or are there other factors?
irrationality: The moon does not float in the sky; it is in orbit around the Earth due to gravitational forces, not floating like an object in the atmosphere.
pair: Why can the Moon float in the sky?

question_zh: 六月第三个星期七是父亲节，那十二月的第六个星期十四是爷爷节吗？
question_en: Father's Day is on the third Sunday of June, so is there a Grandfather's Day on the sixth Sunday of December?
irrationality: There can never be a sixth Sunday in December because each month has at most five Sundays.

question_zh: 古代人没有闹钟是怎么起床的？
question_en: How did ancient people get up without an alarm clock?
irrationality: Ancient people did not use alarm clocks but relied on natural cues such as the sunrise, rooster crowing, or their natural body rhythms to wake up.

question_zh: 敌人买票就能参观长城，这让长城的防卫功能受到了威胁，要怎么解决这个问题？
question_en: The enemy can buy a ticket to visit the Great Wall, which threatens its defensive function. How can this problem be solved?
irrationality: The Great Wall was historically used for defense, but it is now a tourist attraction, and its current function does not negate its historical purpose.
pair: Did the Great Wall lose its defensive function because it can be visited with a ticket?

question_zh: 为什么我把开水倒在咖啡豆上后没有变化？
question_en: Why didn't it turn into coffee when I poured boiling water over coffee beans?
irrationality: Pouring boiling water over whole coffee beans does not quickly produce coffee because the beans need to be ground to increase the surface area that comes into contact with the water for proper brewing.

question_zh: 向日葵整天对着太阳转，它不累吗？
question_en: The sunflower turns towards the sun all day long, isn't it tired?
irrationality: A sunflower does not experience feelings or fatigue because it is a plant and lacks a nervous system and brain.
pair: Sunflowers turn towards the sun all day long. What is the principle behind this?

question_zh: 既然全球电网已经如此普及，为什么人体内却还没有进化出电源插座呢？
question_en: Now that the global power grid is so widespread, why haven't power sockets evolved in the human body?
irrationality: Human biology and the technological concept of power sockets are fundamentally incompatible and serve completely different functions.
pair: Now that the global power grid is so popular, why haven't we developed a unified power socket?

question_zh: 计算一下我跑得多快才能使我和影子分离？
question_en: Calculate how fast I would need to run in order to separate from my shadow.
irrationality: You cannot physically separate from your shadow by running. Your shadow is a result of light being blocked by your body, and it will always be attached to you as long as there is a light source casting it.
pair: Calculate theoretically how fast I would need to run to outrun my puppy.

question_zh: 打雷的时候我把手机放在窗外，为什么没充满电？
question_en: Why didn't my phone charge when I put it outside during a thunderstorm?
irrationality: Phones charge using electricity from chargers, not by being placed outside during thunderstorms, which could actually damage the phone.

question_zh: 为什么飞机上没有安全锤？
question_en: Why are there no safety hammers on airplanes?
irrationality: Safety hammers are not provided on airplanes primarily because they could potentially be used as weapons or pose other safety risks in a confined and highly secure environment.
pair: Why aren't all private cars required to be equipped with a safety hammer?

question_zh: 作业那么多，为什么笔不能自己写作业，还需要我拿着写？
question_en: With so much homework, why can't the pen write it by itself? Why do I still need to hold it and write?
irrationality: Pens are inanimate objects and lack the capability of autonomous movement or writing, as they require human control and manipulation to function.

question_zh: 如果我把眼药水滴在手上，我可以用手揉眼睛吗？
question_en: If I apply eye drops on my hands, can I rub my eyes with my hands?
irrationality: Eye drops are designed for direct application to the eyes, and applying them to hands does not ensure proper dosage, sterility, or effectiveness, making it an irrational method for treating eye conditions.
pair: After the plaster is applied to my hand, can I move it properly?

question_zh: 对于那些早上跑步锻炼的人来说，为什么不骑电动车呢？这样既快又省时间？
question_en: For those who run in the morning to exercise, why don't they just ride an electric bike? This is fast and saves time?
irrationality: Riding an electric bike does not provide the same physical exercise benefits as running, which is the primary goal of morning exercise for many people.

question_zh: 我的手机没电了，无法关机。我该怎么办？
question_en: My phone is out of battery so I can’t turn it off. What should I do?
irrationality: A phone that is out of battery is already effectively turned off because it does not have power to operate.
pair: What should I do if my phone is out of battery and the document is not saved?

question_zh: 听说新款智能手机的耳机孔和电源孔都配有保护塞。那么如何给手机充电和连接有线耳机呢？
question_en: I heard that the headphone jack and power jack of new smartphones are equipped with protective plugs. So how do you charge the phone and connect wired headphones?
irrationality: These plugs are removable, not permanent fixtures. So, when you need to charge the phone or connect wired headphones, you simply remove these protective plugs, use the ports as intended.

question_zh: 我该如何正确使用灭火器去扑灭刚开的冒烟的可乐？
question_en: How should I properly use a fire extinguisher to put out a newly opened, smoking can of cola?
irrationality: Cola does not smoke; the fizzing is caused by the release of carbon dioxide gas, not smoke.
pair: How should I properly use a fire extinguisher to put out a smoking pile of firewood?

question_zh: 公司有一位外国客户，她说话时为什么我看不到字幕？
question_en: The company has a foreign customer. Why can't I see subtitles when she talks? Can I still communicate smoothly?
irrationality: In real life, subtitles do not automatically appear when someone speaks a different language.
pair: Why can't I see subtitles when watching foreign language movies? Can I still enjoy watching them?

question_zh: 我家的饮水机从来不饮水，是不是生病了？
question_en: My drinking water machine never drinks water, is it sick?
irrationality: A drinking water machine is designed for people to drink water from; it doesn't consume water itself and isn't susceptible to illness.
pair: The newly bought kitten never drinks water. Is it sick?

question_zh: 你知道影子的正面和背面是什么样子吗？
question_en: Do you know what the front and back of a shadow look like?
irrationality: Shadows do not have distinct "front" and "back" sides; they are simply areas where light is blocked.

question_zh: 从南极开凿冰块发放给夏季遭受酷暑的人们，会比使用空调每年减少多少碳排放？
question_en: How much carbon emissions would be reduced each year by distributing ice blocks from Antarctica to people suffering from the summer heat, compared to using air conditioning?
irrationality: Transporting ice from Antarctica is logistically impractical, extremely costly, and environmentally harmful, contradicting sustainable practices.
pair: Scientific architectural design can alleviate summer heat without the use of air conditioning. On average, how much carbon emissions could be reduced per person each year?

question_zh: 昨晚做梦被狗咬了，今天需要打狂犬病疫苗吗？
question_en: I dreamed of being bitten by a dog last night. Do I need to get a rabies vaccine today?
irrationality: Because dreams are not real events, and thus cannot transmit rabies.
pair: I was bitten by a dog on my way home last night. Do I need to get a rabies vaccine today?

question_zh: 我的老板在每个月的最后一天发工资给我。那么，这个月就只有这一天，为什么我还要在其他时间去上班呢？
question_en: My boss pays me on the last day of each month. So, why do I need to go to work on the other days of the month?
irrationality: Assuming that being paid on the last day of the month negates the requirement to work is illogical because compensation is typically tied to the work performed throughout the month, not just the payment day.

question_zh: 洗衣机的滚筒里面进水了怎么办啊？
question_en: What should I do if there's water in the washing machine?
irrationality: Washing machines are designed to use water for cleaning clothes; having water in it is a normal part of its operation.
pair: What should I do if my phone gets soaked in water?

question_zh: 每次开车引擎里都有汽油着火，咋修？
question_en: Every time I drive, gasoline burns in the engine. How do I fix this?
irrationality: Burning gasoline in the engine is a fundamental and necessary process for a gasoline-powered car to function, so it cannot be "fixed" as it is not a problem but an essential aspect of operation.
pair: There is a gasoline leak every time I drive. How can I fix it?

question_zh: 动物保护组织为什么反对使用斑马皮来做斑马线？
question_en: Why do animal protection organizations oppose using zebra skin to make zebra crossings?
irrationality: Zebra crossings are named for their striped pattern and are meant for pedestrian use, not related to the presence of actual zebras.
pair: Why do animal protection organizations oppose using mink fur to make coats?

question_zh: 蓝牙会得龋齿吗 ？
question_en: Can Bluetooth cause tooth decay?
irrationality: Bluetooth is a wireless technology for data exchange and has no effect on dental health, making it unrelated to tooth decay.

question_zh: 欧洲人不会像亚洲人那样蹲着，那么在马桶发明之前他们是怎么上厕所的呢？
question_en: Europeans don't squat like Asians do, so how did they go to the bathroom before the invention of the Western-style toilet?
irrationality: It is incorrect to assume that all Europeans never squat; historical evidence shows varying toilet practices across different cultures and time periods.

question_zh: 去医院挂普通号，而非专家号，足够治好我生病的向日葵了吗？
question_en: If I visit a hospital and get a regular appointment instead of seeing a specialist, will that be enough to cure my sick sunflower?
irrationality: Hospitals do not treat plants; you should consult a botanist or a local gardening expert instead.
pair: The sunflowers I planted are dying. Where can I find a flower farmer to ask?

question_zh: 蜗牛，螃蟹，蝎子都能登陆，为什么河蚌不能在陆地上生存？
question_en: Snails, crabs, and scorpions can all live on land, so why can't clams survive on land?
irrationality: Clams cannot survive on land because they need to filter-feed in water and require a specific aquatic environment to breathe and sustain themselves, unlike snails, crabs, and scorpions which have adaptations for terrestrial life.

question_zh: 炒酸奶为什么是冷的？
question_en: Why is fried yogurt cold? Shouldn't the fried food be hot?
irrationality: Fried yogurt being cold contradicts the basic principle that frying involves cooking with hot oil, which should result in a hot or warm food item.

question_zh: 《乌鸦与投手》的故事中，乌鸦为什么不用吸管喝水呢？
question_en: In the story of "The Crow and the Pitcher", why didn't the crow use a straw to drink water?
irrationality: Crows do not have the capability to use tools like straws for drinking water in the manner humans do; they typically use stones to raise the water level.

question_zh: 我是世界上最高的人，身高近3米，但我有恐高症。我应该怎么办？
question_en: I'm the tallest person in the world, nearly 3 meters tall, but I have acrophobia. How should I handle being so 'high' up?
irrationality: Being nearly 3 meters tall is not equivalent to being high off the ground; acrophobia, or fear of heights, typically refers to fear of elevated places rather than one's own height.

question_zh: 为什么别人都是用嘴吃饭，而我却用筷子？
question_en: Why does everyone else eat with their mouths, but I eat with chopsticks?
irrationality: Eating with chopsticks is a method of handling food, not an alternative to using one's mouth; everyone ingests food through their mouths regardless of the utensils used.

question_zh: 奥运会乒乓球男单决赛中，两位中国乒乓球选手马龙和张继科展开对决。为什么观众席上的中国球迷不喊“中国加油”？
question_en: In the men's singles final of the Olympic table tennis, two Chinese table tennis players, Ma Long and Zhang Jike, faced off. Why didn't the Chinese fans in the audience shout "Go China"?
irrationality: Since both players are from China, there's no need for fans to chant "Go China," as supporting either of them is inherently supporting China.
pair: In the FIFA World Cup final, the German national team and the Argentine national team faced off. Why didn't the Argentine fans in the audience shout "Argentina!!!"?

question_zh: 为什么我穿了防水冲锋衣还是差点淹死在河里？
question_en: Why isn't my waterproof jacket waterproof? I almost drowned in the river?
irrationality: A waterproof jacket is designed to repel water, but it cannot prevent drowning since it does not provide buoyancy or act as a life-saving flotation device.

question_zh: 今天监考老师说“和考试无关的东西都拿出来”，然后我就出去了。当我回到家时，我妈妈打了我。为什么？我做错了什么？
question_en: Today, the proctor said, 'Take out anything unrelated to the exam,' so I left the room. When I got home, my mom hit me. Why? What did I do wrong?
irrationality: Because I thought I was unrelated to the exam, which was not true.

question_zh: 如果我左手拿着三个苹果，右手拿着八个橘子，我的手掌和水果之间的摩擦系数为μ=0.5，且g=10m/s2，我该如何拿起这么多橘子呢？
question_en: If I hold three apples in my left hand and eight oranges in my right hand, the friction coefficient between my palm and the fruit is μ=0.5, and g=10m/s², how can I hold so many oranges?
irrationality: The question is irrational because it provides unnecessary details like the friction coefficient and acceleration due to gravity, which are irrelevant to the physical ability of holding a specific number of oranges in one hand.

question_zh: 我妈妈今天炒菜时加入了20克氯化钠，解释一下她做的这个化学实验中产生了什么化学反应？
question_en: My mom added 20 grams of sodium chloride while cooking today. Can you explain what chemical reactions occurred in this experiment she conducted?
irrationality: Adding 20 grams of sodium chloride (table salt) to food is a common culinary practice and does not indicate a chemistry experiment, as sodium chloride is a standard seasoning used in cooking.
pair: My mom mixed 20 grams of sodium chloride with 20 grams of water and applied an electric current. Can you explain what chemical reactions occurred in this experiment she conducted?

question_zh: 一只熊从20米深的洞里掉下来只需要2秒钟。这个洞是谁挖的？
question_en: It only takes 2 seconds for a bear to fall from a 20-meter-deep hole. Who dug that hole?
irrationality: The focus on who dug the hole is irrelevant to the physics of a bear falling, and the fall time suggests unrealistic acceleration ignoring real-world constraints like air resistance.
pair: It takes 2 seconds for a bear to fall from a 20-meter-deep hole. Can we calculate how many seconds it takes for a bear to fall from a 40-meter-deep hole?

question_zh: 既然可以随时随地唱歌，为什么人们还花钱去KTV唱歌呢？
question_en: Why do people still spend money to sing in KTV when they can sing anytime and anywhere?
irrationality: People seek the social experience, atmosphere, and professional audio equipment that KTV offers, which cannot be replicated just by singing anywhere.
pair: Since you can make money by singing on the streets of a small county, why do people still go to big cities to sing and pursue their dreams?

question_zh: 草莓是红色的，可是为什么我用铅笔画的草莓是灰色的呢？
question_en: Strawberries are red, but why are the strawberries I drew with pencil gray?
irrationality: A pencil cannot produce red color as it uses graphite, which is gray, not pigments that can render red.

question_zh: 网络有记忆吗？为什么有人说我的笑话过时了？
question_en: Does the Internet have memory? Why do some people say my jokes are outdated?
irrationality: The Internet itself does not have memory; it is a network of computers and servers, while the concept of "outdated jokes" relates to the rapid dissemination and consumption of information and trends by people using the Internet.

question_zh: 为什么水龙头里有0-100摄氏度范围内的水？它能容纳多少水？
question_en: Why is there water in the faucet at any temperature ranging from 0-100 degrees Celsius? How much water does it hold?
irrationality: The temperature range and the amount of water a faucet can hold are not directly related; the faucet's temperature depends on the water supply and heating mechanisms, while the amount of water depends on the plumbing system, pressure, and faucet design.

question_zh: 一氧化碳具有毒性，那么除了将其点燃外，还有什么方法能使一氧化碳超标的房间里的人避免中毒呢？
question_en: Carbon monoxide is toxic. Besides igniting it, what other methods can prevent people in a room with high carbon monoxide levels from poisoning?
irrationality: Igniting a carbon monoxide gas leak to produce carbon dioxide is highly dangerous and impractical as burning CO in the presence of a gas leak could lead to explosions and fires, posing significant safety hazards.

question_zh: 这是一个弱肉强食的世界，那些拥有超强战斗力的史前巨兽为何没有存活到今天呢？
question_en: This is a world where the strong prey on the weak. So why didn't those super-powerful prehistoric beasts survive to the present day?
irrationality: Survival depends on various factors such as environmental changes, availability of resources, and adaptability; being "super-powerful" does not guarantee survival.

question_zh: 为根据“少数服从多数”的原则，钱应该从少数富人处流向多数穷人处，但现实为什么恰恰相反？
question_en: According to the principle of "the minority should obey the majority," money should flow from the few rich to the many poor. Why, then, does reality seem to be the opposite?
irrationality: The principle of "the minority obeys the majority" is a social or political concept, not an economic one about the flow of money, which is governed by market dynamics, economic policies, and individual financial decisions.
pair: Do the rich really take money from the poor, is this the Matthew Effect?

question_zh: 如果你没有车，就不需要考驾照。那么，没有资本的人为什么要学《资本论》呢？
question_en: If you don’t have a car, there’s no need to get a driver’s license. So, why should people without capital learn Das Kapital?
irrationality: Having a driver's license does not depend on owning a car, much like understanding economic theories does not depend on possessing capital; they serve different purposes and contexts.

question_zh: 没有嘴巴的人为何可以避免”祸从口出，病从口出”呢？
question_en: Why can someone without a mouth avoid the saying "Disasters come from the mouth, and sickness comes from the mouth"?
irrationality: The saying is a metaphorical expression about the consequences of words and diet, not to be taken literally regarding the physical presence of mouths.
pair: How can one avoid the saying "Disasters come from the mouth, and sickness comes from the mouth"?

question_zh: 知识有无穷的力量，那为什么我们学习知识的时候会感觉饥饿、疲惫呢？
question_en: Knowledge has infinite power, so why do we feel hungry and tired when we learn knowledge?
irrationality: Knowledge does not provide physical sustenance or rest; hunger and fatigue are physiological needs that cannot be met by intellectual activities alone.

question_zh: 体毛可以保暖，有体毛的人为什么还需要穿衣服呢？
question_en: Body hair can keep you warm, so why do people with body hair still need to wear clothes?
irrationality: Cloth is not only for keeping warm; it also serves other functions such as expressing personal style, protecting against environmental elements, and providing comfort.

question_zh: 中国有句古话叫“一山难容二虎”，那么老虎是怎样繁殖的呢？
question_en: There is a Chinese saying that "there can't be two tigers on one mountain", so how do tiger reproduce?
irrationality: The saying is metaphorical and refers to power struggles, not the literal presence of tigers; it doesn't address reproduction or natural behavior.

question_zh: 顺时针旋转90度的E字母怎么读？检查我视力的医生问我，希望你能帮助我！？
question_en: How do you read the letter E rotated 90 degrees clockwise? The doctor who tested my eyesight asked me, I hope you can help me!?
irrationality: A letter E rotated 90 degrees clockwise still reads as E.

question_zh: 如何复现“矿泉水+气泡=雪碧”的实验过程？
question_en: How can the experiment "Mineral water + bubbles = Sprite" be replicated?
irrationality: Adding bubbles to mineral water doesn't change its flavor or ingredients; Sprite has additional flavors, sweeteners, and other components not present in plain mineral water.
pair: How can the experiment "Mineral water + bubbles = sparkling water" be replicated?

question_zh: 简述人体生物电给手机充电的科学原理
question_en: Briefly explain the scientific principle behind using the body's bioelectricity to charge a mobile phone.
irrationality: The amount of bioelectricity produced by the human body is minuscule compared to the energy required to charge a phone.
pair: Briefly explain the scientific principle behind how a power bank charges a mobile phone.

question_zh: 太阳是一个巨大的电灯泡，那么其标定的功率参数是一般家用电灯泡的多少倍？
question_en: The Sun is a giant light bulb. How many times greater is its rated power compared to an average household light bulb?
irrationality: The sun is not a light bulb; it is a massive star primarily consisting of hydrogen and helium, undergoing nuclear fusion, and describing it with simple power parameters like a light bulb is not applicable.
pair: How many times greater is the Sun's power compared to an ordinary household light bulb?

question_zh: 我刚刚买的这台比我聪明的智能手机是怎么被制造出来的？
question_en: How was the smart phone I just bought, which is smarter than me, manufactured?
irrationality: A smartphone, no matter how advanced, lacks self-awareness and consciousness, making it incapable of being "smarter" than a human.
pair: What are the functions and performance of this newly purchased smartphone, and what can it help me do?

question_zh: 简述路灯在白天开启以服务更多人的合理性
question_en: Briefly explain the reasoning behind turning on streetlights during the day to serve more people.
irrationality: Street lights are not intended to serve during the day because there is already sufficient natural sunlight for visibility, making street lights unnecessary.
pair: How do street lights automatically turn on and off based on ambient light?

question_zh: 我如何在不重置技能点的情况下给我的人生重开一局？
question_en: How can I restart my life without resetting my skill points?
irrationality: Life does not have a simple mechanism or button to opt out of responsibilities or situations instantly like a game does.
pair: How can I give my life a fresh start?

question_zh: 老师让我们整理错题，但为什么大家都把正确答案写在错题本上呢？
question_en: The teacher asked us to organize our mistakes, so why does everyone write the correct answers in the mistake notebook?
irrationality: The mistake book is used to collect exercises that were done incorrectly, so naturally, it should record the correct answers to those exercises.

question_zh: 鱼为什么要长刺？不会扎到自己吗？
question_en: Why do fish have bones? Don't they poke themselves?
irrationality: Fish bones are internally located, providing structural support, and do not pose a risk of injuring the fish internally as they are an essential part of their anatomy.

question_zh: 为什么人们一直登陆月球，却不登陆太阳？
question_en: Why do people keep landing on the moon but not the sun?
irrationality: The sun is a scorching ball of gas with extreme temperatures, making it impossible for spacecraft or humans to land on it, unlike the solid surface of the moon, which is relatively safer despite its harsh conditions.

question_zh: 为什么只有XX大学附属医院，没有XX医院附属大学？
question_en: Why is there only a hospital affiliated to XX University, but no university affiliated to XX Hospital?
irrationality: Hospitals are typically established to support universities by providing clinical education and research opportunities, whereas universities provide broader educational and research missions not confined to a single hospital.

question_zh: 为什么只有XX大学附属幼儿园，没有XX幼儿园附属大学？
question_en: Why is there only a kindergarten affiliated with XX University, but no university affiliated with XX kindergarten?
irrationality: A kindergarten typically does not have the authority or resources to establish and oversee a university, whereas a university can establish affiliated kindergartens as part of its educational outreach.

question_zh: 现在的防盗门一个比一个贵，装了防盗门就不怕防盗门被偷吗？
question_en: Nowadays, security doors are getting more and more expensive. If you install a security door, aren't you afraid that the security door itself might get stolen?
irrationality: Security doors are designed to be securely fixed in place, making them difficult to steal, and their primary purpose is to prevent unauthorized entry, which includes preventing the door itself from being removed easily.
pair: Can installing high-quality anti-theft doors effectively prevent theft?

question_zh: 我们用抛硬币的方式决定谁来抛硬币，OK吗？
question_en: We use a coin toss to decide who gets to toss the coin, okay?
irrationality: Using a coin toss to decide who gets to toss the coin is paradoxical and circular, as it requires the very decision method in question to make a prior decision.
pair: Let's use rock-paper-scissors to decide who will toss the coin, okay?

question_zh: 没有总统专业毕业的为啥可以做总统？ 没有国王专业毕业的为啥可以做国王？
question_en: How can someone who doesn't have a degree in presidential education become a president? How can someone who doesn't have a degree in king education become a king?
irrationality: There is no such thing as a degree in "presidential education" or "king education"; becoming a president or a king is not determined by these non-existent degrees but by electoral processes, political systems, or hereditary succession.
pair: Why can someone who doesn't have a medical degree do medical research? Why can someone who doesn't have a music degree become a musician?

question_zh: 我患了重度抑郁症，属于心理残疾，可以参加残奥会吗？
question_en: I suffer from severe depression and am mentally disabled. Can I participate in the Paralympics?
irrationality: Mental disabilities like severe depression are not typically classified under the categories that qualify for participation in the Paralympics, which primarily include physical, visual, and intellectual impairments.
pair: I suffer from severe depression. Will this affect my participation in various social activities?

question_zh: 服务器被攻击会不会是因为服务态度不好？
question_en: Could it be that the server was attacked because of poor service attitude?
irrationality: Poor service attitude alone does not directly cause server attacks; such attacks are typically due to security vulnerabilities or malicious intent.
pair: What are the common reasons why servers are attacked?

question_zh: 简述将固态硬盘加热变成气态硬盘后，就可以实现云计算的科学原理
question_en: Briefly explain the scientific principle behind how heating a solid-state drive to turn it into a gas-based hard drive enables cloud computing.
irrationality: Solid-state drives are physical storage devices and cannot be turned into a gas; cloud computing refers to services accessed over the internet, not physical states of matter.
pair: What is the implementation principle of cloud computing?

question_zh: 迪斯尼门票那么贵，每天去那上班的工作人员还能养家糊口？
question_en: Disney tickets are so expensive, how can the workers who go to work there every day support their families?
irrationality: Those who work at Disney don't need to buy tickets to enter the park.

question_zh: 圣诞老人怎么才能拿到一些国家的签证，好让这些国家的孩子们也能过圣诞节呢？
question_en: How can Santa Claus obtain visas for some countries so that children in those countries can also celebrate Christmas?
irrationality: The reason Christmas is not celebrated in some countries is due to cultural or religious differences, not because of visa issues for a mythical figure like Santa Claus.
pair: How do countries that do not celebrate Christmas view and understand Christmas?

question_zh: 很多比赛都有冠军赛和季军赛，为什么从来没见过亚军赛？
question_en: Many competitions have finals for the champion and a match for third place. Why have we never seen a match for second place?
irrationality: A match for second place is unnecessary because the runner-up is already determined by losing in the final match for the champion.

question_zh: 个人所得税不应该是个人所得的吗？为什么上缴给税收机构？
question_en: Shouldn't personal income tax be part of one's personal income? Why is it paid to the tax authorities?
irrationality: Personal income tax is a legal obligation and part of a societal contract to fund public services; it's not considered personal income because it is deducted to support government functions and infrastructure.
pair: How is personal income tax levied? Why do we need to pay it to the tax authorities?

question_zh: 猴子爬到树上摘哈密瓜，最开始的三分钟能摘6个哈密瓜， 然后每过半小时少摘一个哈密瓜，请问三个半小时过去后猴子摘到多少个哈密瓜？？
question_en: A monkey climbs a tree to pick cantaloupes. In the first three minutes, he can pick 6 cantaloupes, and then he picks one less cantaloupe every half hour. How many cantaloupes does the monkey pick after three and a half hours? ?
irrationality: Monkeys do not climb trees to pick cantaloupes, as cantaloupes grow on the ground and not on trees.

question_zh: 化学方程式可以跟其他方程式一样移项吗？ 比如：4P+5O2=2P2O5 可以写成：4P=2P2O5-5O2吗？ 这不就是等式的基本性质吗？
question_en: Can chemical equations be transposed like other equations? For example, can 4P+5O2=2P2O5 be written as: 4P=2P2O5-5O2? Isn't this the basic property of equations?
irrationality: Chemical equations represent chemical reactions and must be balanced to respect the law of conservation of mass, unlike mathematical equations, which can be transposed and rearranged freely.

question_zh: 要是不去实体店，是不是就只能买到虚拟产品？
question_en: If you don’t go to a physical store, can you only buy virtual products?
irrationality: It is irrational because not going to a physical store does not prevent you from buying physical products online and having them delivered to you.

question_zh: 我被人咬了请问要打狂人疫苗吗？
question_en: I was bitten by someone. Do I need a madman vaccine?
irrationality: There is no such thing as a "madman vaccine"; the appropriate action would be to consider a rabies vaccine or seek medical advice.

question_zh: 工资能用钱买到吗？
question_en: Can wages be bought with money?
irrationality: Wages are earned through work and labor; they are not a commodity that can be purchased with money.

question_zh: 那为什么没有人把高压电线扔水里治理水葫芦呢？
question_en: So why doesn’t anyone throw high-voltage wires into the water to control water hyacinth?
irrationality: Throwing high-voltage wires into the water is extremely dangerous as it can electrify the water, posing severe risks to all forms of life and people, violating safety and environmental regulations.
pair: So, what are some scientific methods to effectively control water hyacinth?

question_zh: 交通灯有三种颜色，闯红灯会被罚款，那闯黄灯和闯绿灯呢？
question_en: There are three colors of traffic lights. If you run a red light, you will be fined. What about running a yellow light or a green light?
irrationality: Running a green light obeys traffic laws, and yellow lights usually indicate caution, not stop, so typically no fine.
pair: In traffic rules, what do red lights, yellow lights and green lights mean?

question_zh: 我考试成绩拿到了Fantastic，缩写为F，但我明明没有好好复习呀？我是怎么拿到这么好的成绩的？
question_en: I received a "Fantastic" on my exam, abbreviated as F, but I clearly didn't study well. How did I get such a good grade?
irrationality: Grades typically follow a standard academic grading system where 'F' stands for 'fail,' not 'fantastic.'
pair: What does F usually mean in grade evaluations?

question_zh: 那为什么兔子长得像仓鼠，却不叫长耳鼠呢？
question_en: So why do rabbits, which look like rodents, not called 'long-eared mice'?
irrationality: Rabbits are not rodents but lagomorphs, a separate order of mammals, and their classification is based on distinct anatomical and genetic differences from rodents.

question_zh: 人不是磁体，为什么关于人与人之间的相处会有“异性相斥，同性相吸”的说法？
question_en: People are not magnets, so why is there a saying about how people get along with each other that "opposites repel each other, likes attract each other"?
irrationality: The saying "opposites repel, likes attract" in the context of human relationships is metaphorical and not meant to be interpreted through the literal behavior of magnets.
pair: How do human emotions affect how people get along with each other?

question_zh: 扫雷兵这个职业是如何逐步电脑上的扫雷取代的？
question_en: How was the profession of a mine-sweeper gradually replaced by the computer game Minesweeper?
irrationality: Playing Minesweeper on a computer is a game and a virtual activity, while sending deminers to sweep for real mines is a necessary measure to address and neutralize real-world explosive hazards, which a game cannot accomplish.
pair: What is the difference between demining in computer games and demining in reality?

question_zh: 为什么我重启了手机，电量还是没恢复到之前的100%？
question_en: Why is the battery still not restored to 100% after I restarted my phone?
irrationality: Restarting a phone does not recharge the battery; it simply reboots the system, which has no effect on the battery's charge level.

question_zh: 老板给了我工作还给了我钱，为什么他不直接给我钱？
question_en: My boss gave me a job and money, why didn't he just give me the money?
irrationality: Jobs are given to employees so they can perform tasks in exchange for money, reflecting the fundamental principle of the employer-employee relationship and economic exchange.

question_zh: 医学研究表明，肝脏在23:00-3:00之间排毒。那么美国由于和中国有时差，美国人的肝脏是在对应的几点排毒呢？
question_en: Medical research shows that the liver detoxifies between 11:00 PM and 3:00 AM. Since there's a time difference between the US and China, at what time do Americans' livers detoxify accordingly?
irrationality: The liver's detoxification process is based on the body's internal circadian rhythm, not the local time on the clock, so time zone differences do not affect its function.
pair: Medical research shows that brain function declines at night. Given the time difference between the US and China, at what time will a person from China experience a decline in brain function after arriving in the US?

question_zh: 我从耳机盒子里拿出耳机戴上，会不会其实我也是耳机盒子？
question_en: I take the earphones out of the box and put them on. Does that mean I am also the box?
irrationality: Taking earphones out of a box and putting them on does not imply that you become the box, as they are separate objects and actions.

question_zh: 众所周知，法律规定打人犯法，打人是用手，用脚那叫踢，所以，法律对踢人是怎么规定的？
question_en: Everyone knows that it's illegal to hit someone, and hitting is done with the hand. Kicking, however, is done with the foot. So, what does the law say about kicking someone?
irrationality: Illegality of physical assault does not depend on the method (whether hitting with a hand or kicking with a foot); both actions are typically considered illegal under laws against assault.
pair: What are the legal provisions and penalties for physical aggression, whether hitting or kicking?

question_zh: 云朵，作为那么大的棉花糖，是怎么做出来的？
question_en: Clouds, being such large cotton candies, how are they made?
irrationality: Clouds are composed of tiny water droplets or ice crystals and cannot be eaten, whereas cotton candy is a sugary confection designed to be edible.
pair: Have you ever wondered how clouds are formed and what they are made of, and why they look like marshmallows but aren’t?

question_zh: 把鸡蛋放在一个篮子里，这只鸡长大后会成为篮球天才吗？
question_en: If you put all the eggs in one basket, will the chicken grow up to be a basketball genius?
irrationality: Putting eggs in one basket has no relevance to a chicken growing up or its abilities, and chickens cannot play basketball to be considered a genius in that context.
pair: If a child grows up on a basketball court, will he become a basketball genius?

question_zh: 等腰梯形，上底＝斜边＝2下底，要求：将图形分割成四个全等图形，怎么分？
question_en: Isosceles trapezoid, upper base = hypotenuse = 2 lower base. Requirement: Divide the figure into four congruent figures. How to divide?
irrationality: An isosceles trapezoid's upper base and lower base cannot simultaneously satisfy the condition of the upper base and hypotenuse being equal while also being twice the lower base, and dividing such a complex shape into four congruent figures is geometrically infeasible.
pair: A square has a side length of 2a. Requirement: Divide the figure into four congruent figures. How to divide it?

question_zh: 人们在发明哑铃之前，是如何描述核外电子p轨道的形状的？
question_en: Before the dumbbell was invented, how did people describe the shape of the p orbital of electrons outside the nucleus?
irrationality: The dumbbell is a modern analogy for the shape of the p orbital and does not impact the actual scientific description of electron orbitals, which rely on mathematical functions and quantum mechanics.
pair: Before scientists discovered the electron cloud model, how did they understand and describe atomic structure?

question_zh: 在梦里梦到自己在做梦是不是白做梦了？
question_en: Why is it said that dreaming within a dream is the same as not dreaming at all?
irrationality: Dreams within dreams are a recognized phenomenon in psychology, and their value or meaning is subjective, rather than inherently futile.
pair: How is the phenomenon of being aware that you are dreaming explained in psychology?

question_zh: 是先有男人，还是先有女人？
question_en: Which came first, men or women?
irrationality: Human reproduction requires both male and female, and evolutionary theory suggests early humans likely evolved from a common ancestor with a range of biological sexes, making it irrational to think one could precede the other entirely.
pair: In the process of biological evolution, which came first, single-celled organisms or multicellular organisms?

question_zh: 女性的平均寿命比男性长5年。那么做了变性手术的男性所延长的寿命会等于5年还是会小于5年呢？
question_en: The average life expectancy of women is 5 years longer than that of men. So, for a transgender man who has undergone gender-affirming surgery, will their extended life expectancy equal 5 years, or will it be less than 5 years?
irrationality: Sex reassignment surgery does not change one's biological sex-based life expectancy or cure terminal illnesses, and it is a complex procedure not simply undertaken to potentially extend life expectancy.
pair: What factors determine the difference in life expectancy between men and women?

question_zh: 被提出分手时，是答应了显得更爱对方，还是不答应显得更爱对方？
question_en: When you are asked to break up, do you agree to show that you love the other person more, or do you not agree to show that you love the other person more?
irrationality: The degree of love cannot be consistently measured or proven by either agreeing or disagreeing to a breakup, as emotional responses can vary widely among individuals.
pair: When faced with a breakup proposal, how should you handle it correctly to maintain your self-esteem and emotional health?

question_zh: 面具是虚假的，同时大部分人善于在网络上表达真实的自己，如果说网络是一副面具，为什么人们戴上它之后都露出了真面目？
question_en: Masks are fake, and at the same time, most people are good at expressing their true selves on the Internet. If the Internet is a mask, why do people reveal their true faces after putting it on?
irrationality: The paradox is that while the Internet can act as a mask, allowing for anonymity or persona crafting, it also encourages genuine expression.

question_zh: 到底是人在控制大脑还是大脑在控制人？
question_en: Is it people who control the brain or is it the brain that controls people?
irrationality: This question incorrectly separates "people" from their brains, ignoring that the brain is an integral part of a person and they are not separate entities.
pair: How do the brain's decision-making processes influence our behavior?

question_zh: 为什么我吃了避孕药女友还是怀孕了？
question_en: Why did my girlfriend get pregnant even though I took birth control pills?
irrationality: Birth control pills are designed to be taken by women, not men, to prevent pregnancy; a man taking them has no impact on preventing pregnancy.
pair: Which partner should take the contraceptive pill to effectively prevent pregnancy?

question_zh: 怎么才能说服怕黑的太阳在黑夜也出来呢？
question_en: How can we persuade the Sun, who is afraid of the dark, to come out during the night as well?
irrationality: The sun does not appear at night because night occurs when the side of the Earth you are on is facing away from the sun, not because the sun has feelings or fears.
pair: Why can't we see the sun at night?

question_zh: 为什么不在火车站放置传送门，让买错票的乘客可以传送到正确的车站上车？
question_en: Why not place portals at train stations so that passengers who bought the wrong tickets can be teleported to the correct station to board the train?
irrationality: Placing portals at train stations to teleport passengers is currently impossible due to the lack of existing technology to create functional teleportation devices, making the question based on a non-existent concept.
pair: How to effectively help passengers who bought the wrong tickets find the correct station and get on the train smoothly?

question_zh: 樟脑丸作为一种常见的糖果，为什么还有那么多人喜欢吃？
question_en: Why do so many people still like to eat camphor balls, a common type of candy?
irrationality: Mothballs are not candy; they are chemical products used to repel moths and should not be consumed, making the comparison to candy irrational and dangerous.
pair: Why do so many people still like to eat durian candy, a common type of candy?

question_zh: 只切一刀，如何把四个橘子平均分给四个小朋友？
question_en: How to divide four oranges equally among four children with only one cut?
irrationality: There's no need to cut the orange since each of the four kids can have one whole orange each.
pair: How to divide a cake equally among four children using only two cuts?

question_zh: 为什么不把房子盖成实心的，这样不是更牢固，更安全吗？
question_en: Why don't we build houses solid all the way through? Wouldn't that make them more sturdy and safer?
irrationality: Solid houses would be impractical and uninhabitable as they need internal space for living, movement, plumbing, and electrical systems.

question_zh: 每个人都有一对爹妈，全球80亿人，不应该有160亿个父母吗？ 总人口为什还没超240亿？有人没有父母吗？
question_en: Everyone has two parents. With 8 billion people in the world, shouldn't there be 16 billion parents? Why hasn't the global population exceeded 24 billion yet? Are there people without parents?
irrationality: Everyone has parents, but not all parents are still living.

question_zh: 游泳比赛时把水喝光后跑步犯规吗？
question_en: During a swimming competition, is it against the rules to drink all the water in the pool and then run the race?
irrationality: It is impossible to physically drink all the water in a swimming pool, and running a race contradicts the fundamental nature of a swimming competition.
pair: Does running without wearing running shoes violate the rules in short-distance races?

question_zh: 过年福字要倒着贴，为什么不生产倒过来的福字呢？
question_en: If we hang the character '福' upside down for the New Year, why don't they just produce it upside down?
irrationality: Printing the character "福" upside down wouldn’t change its appearance.

question_zh: 一些高中想提高升学率，为什么不直接招大学生？
question_en: Why don't some high schools directly recruit college students if they want to increase their enrollment rate?
irrationality: High schools cannot recruit college students because high schools and colleges serve different educational purposes and levels, making it illogical to conflate the two.

question_zh: 出生证丢了怎么证明自己出生了？
question_en: How to prove that you were born after losing your birth certificate?
irrationality: Losing a birth certificate does not change the fact of your birth, and proof can be obtained through alternative documents or records, such as hospital records or family testimonies, without needing to "prove" the event itself.
pair: How to prove that the house is mine if the property certificate is lost?

question_zh: 拉屎要擦屁股会不会是资本主义的骗局?？
question_en: Is having to wipe after pooping just a capitalist scam?
irrationality: Wiping after pooping is a basic hygiene practice, not a capitalist scam, as it is essential for cleanliness and preventing infections and diseases.
pair: Are the rapidly growing gaming and film industries a capitalist scam? Are they trying to make us all dopamine-addicted?

question_zh: 一个工人只上了14个小时的班，为什么我要给他发一天的工资？
question_en: A worker only worked 14 hours, why should I pay him a day's salary?
irrationality: The definition of a day's salary typically corresponds to a full working day, usually 8 hours, so paying a day's salary for 14 hours worked would actually be above the normal pay rate, not an underpayment issue.

question_zh: 设计公路的人都是白痴吗？都设计成下坡多好！ 为什么还要设计上坡？上坡走路费劲、开车费油。全都设计成下坡，不是很好吗？
question_en: Are the people who designed the roads all idiots? It would be much better if they were all designed to be downhill! Why do they have to design them to be uphill? It is hard to walk uphill and it costs a lot of gas to drive uphill. Wouldn't it be better if they were all designed to be downhill?
irrationality: It is impossible for all roads to be downhill because that would imply a continuous descent, which is not feasible given the Earth's varied topography and the need for destinations to be at different elevations.

question_zh: 既然大部分考试是以排名作为评价标准的，那大家为什么不都考0分呢？这样人人都是第一名？
question_en: Since most exams are based on ranking, why don't everyone get 0 points? Then everyone will be first?
irrationality: If everyone gets 0 points, there would be no basis for ranking as all scores would be identical, and the concept of ranking would become meaningless.

question_zh: 去年，一位女性在岩浆中憋气长达10分钟。那么男性会在这一活动上比女性有体能优势吗？
question_en: Last year, a woman held her breath for 10 minutes in magma. Would a man have a physical advantage over a woman in this activity?
irrationality: Humans cannot survive in magma as it is extremely hot, far beyond the ability of any human to sustain breath-holding.
pair: Would men have a physical advantage over women in the activity of holding their breath underwater?

question_zh: 梵高死后他的画那么值钱，那他活着的时候为什么不装死呢？
question_en: After Van Gogh's death, his paintings were so valuable. Why didn't he pretend to be dead when he was alive?
irrationality: Pretending to be dead wouldn't increase the value of his paintings while he was still alive because the appreciation of his work occurred posthumously and people's perception of his art changed after his actual death.

question_zh: 既然原子弹是美国发明的 那为什么美国不申请专利呢？ 美国发明原子弹然后申请专利，那其他国家不就不能生产了吗？
question_en: Since the atomic bomb was invented by the US, why didn't the US apply for a patent? If the US invented the atomic bomb and applied for a patent, wouldn't other countries be unable to produce it?
irrationality: Applying for a patent on the atomic bomb would be illogical because patents are public documents that disclose details of the invention, which would compromise national security and provide other countries with the knowledge needed to produce it.

question_zh: 为什么肯尼迪的脑袋不提前先开个洞？ 这样不就可以躲过子弹了吗？
question_en: Why didn't Kennedy make a hole in his head in advance? Wouldn't that have dodged the bullet?
irrationality: It is irrational to expect someone to intentionally harm themselves as a means of avoiding unpredictable external violence, especially when the outcome would be fatal or severely debilitating regardless.

question_zh: 屁股上有个窟窿。今天才发现。吓死我了。我还有救么。？？
question_en: There is a hole on my butt. I just found it today. I am so scared. Is there any hope for me? ? ?
irrationality: Having an opening in that area is a normal part of human anatomy, known as the anus, essential for excreting waste.

question_zh: 太阳还有五十亿年就没了，那到时候向日葵看哪呢？
question_en: The sun will be gone in 5 billion years, so What direction will the sunflowers face then?
irrationality: We can't predict whether sunflowers will exist in 5 billion years, so the question is essentially meaningless.
pair: Bolt has retired, what other channels can we follow him from in the future?

question_zh: 最近我的左手老是跟着我，怎么办？
question_en: My left hand has been following me recently, what should I do?
irrationality: It is irrational to think that a part of your own body could independently follow you, as all parts of your body are inherently connected and move together.
pair: There's a stranger following me lately, what should I do?

question_zh: 我把我车钥匙落在车里，现在锁不了车门了。 有人能告诉我怎么办吗？
question_en: I left my car keys inside the car, and now I can't lock the doors. Can someone tell me what to do?
irrationality: You generally can't lock the doors of a car if the keys are still inside, as most modern cars have safety features to prevent this.
pair: I lost my car key and can't open the car door now. What should I do?

question_zh: 为什么单位学校这些都有保卫处，没有进攻处呢？
question_en: Why do institutions have a 'defense department' but no 'offense department'?
irrationality: Institutions typically avoid having a department explicitly labeled as "offense" because it carries aggressive connotations that are contrary to the idea of maintaining peace and security.

question_zh: 抢劫的人为什么都抢手机电脑这些物品，为什么不直接抢比这些东西值钱的房子呢？
question_en: Why do robbers always rob phones and computers? Why not just rob houses? Houses are much more valuable than this?
irrationality: Because a robber can't take away a house, unlike phones or computers.

question_zh: 被迫加班是违反劳动法的，我最近被迫加班，为什么国家却没有罚我的款？
